item.title: CVE-2022-2405|2024-08-03T00:39:07.244Z -- unknown -- wp%20popup%20builder%20%E2%80%93%20popup%20forms%20%2C%20marketing%20popup%20%26%20%20newsletter
item.description: The WP Popup Builder WordPress plugin before 1.2.9 does not have authorisation and CSRF check in an AJAX action, allowing any authenticated users, such as subscribers to delete arbitrary Popup

item.title: CVE-2022-2404|2024-08-03T00:39:07.581Z -- unknown -- wp%20popup%20builder%20%E2%80%93%20popup%20forms%20%2C%20marketing%20popup%20%26%20%20newsletter
item.description: The WP Popup Builder WordPress plugin before 1.2.9 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting
